title: Hour 1 – Michael Lee (07-09-20)
itunes:title: Hour 1 – Michael Lee (07-09-20)
description:
FOX Sports Radio hosts Chris Broussard and Rob Parker are in for Dan and the Danettes, and they discuss Stephen Jackson apologizing for his anti-Semitic comments. They debate Patrick Mahomes’ career and if he’s on track to becoming the GOAT of the NFL. Plus, NBA Senior Writer Michael Lee joins the show to share some concerns players have about the Orlando bubble.   

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
